body.p: The International Health Terminology Standard Development Organisation (IHTSDO) Workspace IDE supports agile methods for developing and maintaining concepts. The main window provides a number of features and functions to help you locate and modify concepts, as well as check for compatibility with other concepts.
Documentation and online help for the Editor is available from the Help menu. Users can choose either a searchable, printable PDF version of the IHTSDO Workbench Guidebook, or browsable HTML pages
